title: Ctrl + Left Click not working
body:
Hi, 

I am not able to shortcut my ping, health, cooldowns... with Ctrl + Left Click. 

Does anyone had the same issue ? If yes, were you able to solve it ? How ? 

Thanks, 
Genzuko

replies.body:
Ctrl and left click should be showing timers and status, so it's strange it's not working for you.  You could be having a config problem that's not responding to your input.  Try resetting your config to see if that works.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps!
are you sure that its not actually  alt click?
